title: Lee's ward hoping @Riot
body:
can we make this only on control wards.

{{item:2055}} 
see this ward.  it would make it more of a team effort to help lee get around rather than him just gank camping till he finally gets a good angle.

its as if spotting him and zoning him off seems almost futile due to him just walking around the other side and doing his antics again.  

seriously flashes burnt, mana low,  he should have to feel some tax on his constant lane presences.  

making him only able to hop to control wards would atleast hurt his pocket book a bit or.. crazy thing... require a team to help.

replies.body:
Why is this actually a complaint these days??
It is a massive part of lee sins kit, if he is actually over powered then I think there are other areas he should be nerfed (damage etc.)..

All this would do is dull down the champ.

> [{quoted}](name=AesirIV,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GYXP3Xvs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-22T15:06:56.830+0000)
>
> Why is this actually a complaint these days??
> It is a massive part of lee sins kit, if he is actually over powered then I think there are other areas he should be nerfed (damage etc.)..
> 
> All this would do is dull down the champ.

i agree, lee's ward hopping is essential to his kit, he is based on mobility without ward hop, people will have to run behind the enemy instead just like WARD HOPPING.
i dont see it as essential to his kit.  and making him pay for wards or having his team set things up this would make it more predictable of his antics than just hoping were ever.

With the addition of the exploding plants in the jungle to get over walls, ward hopping isn't really needed on champs anymore. 

If you are going to keep ward hopping, at least nerf some other part of the champion kit to balance it out. Also, allow champs like Braum to ward hop as well.
